hed: Listen to nature from eight of the US National Parks to stay calm and productive
copy: The outdoors offer more than scenery. The sounds of these landscapes are restorative. Using a collection of thousands of hours of field recordings from the US National Parks, we can visit Golden Gate, Sitka, to the Grand Tetons.

hed: Mexico is illegally destroying protected mangrove trees to build an $8 billion oil refinery
copy: Satellite images show a landscape razed to accommodate a controversial $8 billion project at the request of Mexico's president Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador. Worked confirming Max de Haldevang's reporting via remote sensing.

hed: Moby Dick: Or, the imprecision of genetic testing
annotation: Won a Society of News Design award for this
copy: Showing how we can use classic American literature to show the shortcomings of direct-to-consumer genetic testing.

hed: Get a LEGO head to match any emotion
annotation: This also won an award from the Society of News Design.
copy: This algorithm returns a LEGO face to you if you tell it how you feel. I used survey data on thousands of LEGO faces to make this bit of internet magic possible.
Using high-resolution satellite imagery and AfterEffects, we can see the Apple Campus in Cupertino, CA go up in a blink.
